name: AGON
description:
AGON is a customizable board game for 2 players, where the game board is running out of space by shrinking, as well as having random cells blocked during gameplay.

You can set different parameters before the play to customize the game.

The goal is capture or shoot the enemy General before they capture you, or you run out of space and time.

You can move your pieces with the mouse keys and control the camera with A,W,S,D and the mouse wheel for zoom.
If you have finished your move, click on "Next Turn" button beneath the game clock, to let the other player do their turn.

Developed by Reousa and Vollgaser.
